welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Maple Heights, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, friendly community, and rich history. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hopkins International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A primarily serves United Airlines and its Star Alliance partners.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B primarily serves American Airlines and its Oneworld partners.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C primarily serves Delta Air Lines and its SkyTeam partners.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fulton International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Fulton International Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
